events.message: I placed my order over two weeks ago but the package still hasn’t arrived, and the tracking information has not been updated for several days.
Case categorized as Delivery Delay based on customer's report of missing shipment and tracking issues.
Assigning support agent to investigate the reported delay in delivery and lack of tracking updates.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear your order hasn’t arrived yet. I’m here to help you find out what’s causing the delay.
Could you please provide your order number and the name on the account so that I can check the latest status with the shipping provider?
Sure, the order number is #A12345 and it was ordered under the name Jane Thompson. I hope we can find out what happened.
I’ve contacted the courier service and they confirmed the package was delayed due to weather conditions but is now en route. Estimated delivery is within 3 days.
Thank you for the update. I appreciate you checking on this and letting me know the expected arrival timeframe.
We consider this issue resolved as the delay has been explained and the delivery is now confirmed to be on its way.
Just checking in to confirm if you have received your package and that everything arrived in good condition. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Yes, I received the package today and everything is fine. Thanks for your help and follow-up!
Closing the case as the customer has confirmed receipt and satisfaction with the resolution. Thank you for contacting support.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to the customer’s email to gather feedback on their recent support experience.
